thread.title: Pierre

author: Pierre
title: Pierre
text: This course leverages the medium/technology to enhance the learning experience and comprehension through simple but very efficient animations. I found this to be particularily beneficial in the interactive navigation rule descriptions. There is no compariosn in studying right of way using animations vs just a book. The one weak spot would be the state specific rules (Chapter 9), this chapter is definitly a bit of an anti-climactic way to end after 8 chapters of well done interactions. In any case I do, whithout any reservations, recommend this package to anyone.
